trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en samling av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> store is opened, the result is represented by an X509Certificate2Collection object.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>store er åpnet, resultatet representeres av et objekt som X509Certificate2Collection.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with the unmanaged Cryptographic API constructs, you can think of an X509Certificate2Collection as a memory store of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du er kjent med uforvaltede kryptografisk API sammensetningene, kan du se på en X509Certificate2Collection som Minnelagring av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objekter.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class without any <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> klasse uten noen <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> informasjon.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object, which is unlike the other constructors that use certificate or collection information to create the object.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter et tomt <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>-objektet som er forskjellig fra konstruktører som bruker sertifikat eller en annen samling informasjon til å opprette objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to start the collection from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekt for å starte i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using an array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av en matrise av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using the specified certificate collection.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte sertifikatsamlingen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the end of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et objekt på slutten av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method adds an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object to a collection and returns the index location of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden legger til en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objekt i en samling og returnerer indeksplassering for sertifikatet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: An X.509 certificate represented as an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Et X.509-sertifikat som er representert som en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The index at which the certificate has been added.
trans-unit.target: Den indeksen som den certificate er lagt til.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Adds multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an array to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til flere <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekter i en matrise til den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to add to an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden hvis du har en rekke <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objekter til å legge til en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: The AddRange and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: AddRange og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>metoder behandle forespørsler bedømme, slik at hvis én Legg til eller fjern mislykkes, hele operasjonen er avbrutt.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Adds multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object to another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til flere <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekter i en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objekt til et annet <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to add to another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden hvis du har sertifikater på en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>objekt som du vil legge til en annen <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>metoder behandle forespørsler bedømme, slik at hvis én Legg til eller fjern mislykkes, hele operasjonen er avbrutt.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object contains a specific certificate.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet inneholder et bestemt sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden utfører en lineær søket. Gjennomsnittlig kjøringstid er derfor proporsjonalt den <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Det vil si denne metoden er en O (`n`) operasjonen, der `n` er <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bestemmer likhet ved å kalle den <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekt for å finne i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: if the contains the specified certificate; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis den inneholder den angitte certificate ; ellers .

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Eksporterer X.509 sertifikatinformasjon til en bytematrise.

trans-unit.source: This method supports content types that do not require a password.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden støtter innholdstyper som ikke krever et passord.

trans-unit.source: A supported <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En støttet <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: X.509 sertifikatinformasjon i en bytematrise.

trans-unit.source: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array using a password.
trans-unit.target: Eksporterer X.509 sertifikatinformasjon til en bytematrise ved hjelp av et passord.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden støtter følgende <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typer:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A supported <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En støttet <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A string used to protect the byte array.
trans-unit.target: En streng som brukes til å beskytte Bytematrisen.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: X.509 sertifikatinformasjon i en bytematrise.

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable, the content is invalid or, in the case of a certificate requiring a password, the private key could not be exported because the password provided was incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Sertifikatet kan ikke leses, innholdet er ugyldig, eller, hvis det er et sertifikat å kreve et passord, den private nøkkelen kan ikke eksporteres fordi det angitte passordet er feil.

trans-unit.source: Searches an object using the search criteria specified by the enumeration and the findValue object.
trans-unit.target: Søk en objekt med søkevilkår som er angitt av den opplisting og findValue objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to find <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects if no user interaction is needed.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å finne <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objekter hvis ingen brukerinteraksjon kreves.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Use the Find method to allow the user to select <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden Finn som tillater brukeren å velge <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objekter.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method can be used in a cascading or nested style, narrowing the search criteria with each call to the method.
trans-unit.target: Merk at denne metoden kan brukes i en overlappende eller nestede stil begrense søkekriteriene med hvert kall til metoden.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The search criteria as an object.
trans-unit.target: Søkevilkårene som et objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow only valid certificates to be returned from the search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>slik at bare gyldige sertifikater som skal returneres fra søket. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: findType is invalid.
trans-unit.target: findTypeer ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en opplisting som kan gå gjennom en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators allow read-only access to data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeratorene gir skrivebeskyttet tilgang til data i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeratorene kan ikke brukes til å endre den underliggende samlingen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator"></xref> object that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator"> </xref> objekt som kan gå gjennom den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importerer et sertifikat i form av en bytematrise til en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden importerer et sertifikat i form av en bytematrise til en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden støtter følgende <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typer:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som inneholder data fra et X.509-sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate file into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importerer sertifikatfilen til en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden støtter følgende <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typer:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på filen som inneholder sertifikatinformasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate, in the form of a byte array that requires a password to access the certificate, into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importerer et sertifikat i form av en bytematrise som krever et passord for å få tilgang til sertifikatet, til en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 binary large object (BLOB) protected by a password.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan bare brukes med en PFX/PKCS12 BLOBen (BLOB) passordbeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 BLOB can be created and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen beholdere tilknyttet sertifikater i PFX/PKCS12 BLOBEN kan opprette og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>verdien kan brukes til å kontrollere denne prosessen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: Merk at hvis du ikke oppretter en nøkkelbeholderen, den private nøkkelen ikke er fast.

trans-unit.source: This method imports a certificate byte array into a collection of certificates.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden importerer bytematrise et sertifikat i en samling med sertifikater.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden støtter følgende <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typer:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som inneholder data fra en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Passordet som kreves for å få tilgang til sertifikatinformasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av de nummereringsverdier som styrer hvordan og hvor sertifikatet er importert.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate file that requires a password into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importerer sertifikatfilen som krever et passord til en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 file or other certificate files that require a password.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan bare brukes med en PFX/PKCS12 fil eller andre sertifikatfiler som krever et passord.

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 file can be created and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen beholdere tilknyttet sertifikater i filen PFX/PKCS12 kan opprette og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>verdien kan brukes til å kontrollere denne prosessen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: Merk at hvis du ikke oppretter en nøkkelbeholderen, den private nøkkelen ikke er fast.

trans-unit.source: Note that a PFX/PKCS12 file can contain more than one certificate.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at en PFX/PKCS12-fil kan inneholde mer enn ett sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: This method imports the first certificate associated with the private key or, if no private key is found, the first certificate found.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden importerer første sertifikatet som er tilknyttet den private nøkkelen eller, hvis ingen privatnøkkel er funnet, er det første sertifikatet som ble funnet.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden støtter følgende <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typer:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på filen som inneholder sertifikatinformasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Passordet som kreves for å få tilgang til sertifikatinformasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av de nummereringsverdier som styrer hvordan og hvor sertifikatet er importert.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an object into the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn et objekt i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property already equals the capacity of the list, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>egenskapen allerede er lik kapasiteten i listen, kapasiteten dobbel ved automatisk å tildele den interne matrisen på nytt før det nye objektet som settes inn.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `index` is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `certificate` is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `index` er lik <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `certificate` legges til slutten av samlingen.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert `certificate`.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen som skal settes inn `certificate`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to insert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekt som settes inn.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexer mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than the property.
trans-unit.target: - eller - index er større enn den egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: -or- The collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - eller - samlingen inneholder en fast størrelse.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir elementet i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjør mulighet å få tilgang til et spesifikt element i samlingen ved hjelp av denne syntaksen: `myCollection[index]`.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet ikke hente eller angi.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Elementet i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexer mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is equal to or greater than the property.
trans-unit.target: - eller - index er lik eller større enn den egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: index is .
trans-unit.target: indexis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a certificate from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner den første forekomsten av et sertifikat fra det <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the first occurrence of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fjerner den første forekomsten av et sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to be removed from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objektet som skal fjernes fra den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Removes multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an array from an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner flere <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekter i en matrise fra en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to remove from an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden hvis du har en rekke <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objekter til å fjerne fra en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and RemoveRange methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>og RemoveRange metoder behandle forespørsler bedømme, slik at hvis én Legg til eller fjern mislykkes, hele operasjonen er avbrutt.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Removes multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object from another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner flere <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekter i en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet fra en annen <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to remove from another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden hvis du har sertifikater på en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>objekt som du vil fjerne fra en annen <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>metoder behandle forespørsler bedømme, slik at hvis én Legg til eller fjern mislykkes, hele operasjonen er avbrutt.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .
